questions.question: Which of the following films was released ten years ago?
questions.moreInfo: Avatar was released in 2009, I Am Legend in 2007, Sin City in 2005 and Limitless in 2011.

questions.question: By what name is Adam Wiles better known?
questions.moreInfo: It's Calvin Harris! If you picked Wiley, his real name is actually Richard Kylea Cowie Jr...

questions.question: Which of the following tennis players has only won the Australian Open once?
questions.moreInfo: It was Rafa Nadal! Fun fact: the other three also have one Grand Slam competition that they've only won once.

questions.question: Which two countries hosted the 2002 FIFA World Cup?
questions.moreInfo: It was South Korea and Japan! That was the only time the World Cup has ever been hosted in Asia!

questions.question: 'B' is the chemical symbol for which element in the periodic table?
'September' was a hit by which American band?
questions.moreInfo: It was Earth, Wind and Fire! They had another hit titled 'Let's Groove!'

questions.question: The fifth planet from the sun is...
questions.moreInfo: Mercury Venus Earth Mars JUPITER Saturn Uranus Neptune Pluto(?)

questions.question: What county is the town of Watford in?
questions.moreInfo: I think a lot of people think it's basically part of London but it's actually in Hertfordshire.

questions.question: Which of these was built last?
questions.moreInfo: The build dates are: Empire State Building: 1931, Eiffel Tower: 1889, Parthenon: 447 and Taj Mahal: 1653.

questions.question: The Netherlands is bordered by Germany and which other country?
questions.moreInfo: It's Belgium! Did you know that Dutch is an official language there too?
